imdb.plot outline: Welcome to Quirky, the unique technology company that has re-engineered and democratized the business of innovation, fast-tracking the product development cycle to new extremes. In each episode, the Quirky team of design and fabrication geniuses selects one product idea submitted by their online community that seeks to solve everyday problems. The hopeful inventors are then guided through the high-stakes world of innovation from simple sketch to working prototype. Then Quirky shares the profits with the global group of connected influencers - people who help make a good idea even better. A brand new way to create, it's an entertaining look at what's just ahead of the curve.
imdb.title: Quirky
plot: Showcases _Quirky_ (qv), a unique product development company that lets its online community submit ideas for new inventions.::Anonymous

Welcome to _Quirky_ (qv), the unique technology company that has re-engineered and democratized the business of innovation, fast-tracking the product development cycle to new extremes. In each episode, the _Quirky_ (qv) team of design and fabrication geniuses selects one product idea submitted by their online community that seeks to solve everyday problems. The hopeful inventors are then guided through the high-stakes world of innovation from simple sketch to working prototype. Then _Quirky_ (qv) shares the profits with the global group of connected influencers - people who help make a good idea even better. A brand new way to create, it's an entertaining look at what's just ahead of the curve.::Sundance Channel
